description: A classic marmalade recipe but with grapefruit adds a sweet bitterness.
keywords: Marmalade,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Grapefruit Marmalade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the fruit with hot water to remove wax from the skin. Slice the top and bottom off the lemon and grapefruit and slice into quarters.
Remove as many of the pips as possible by using a fork. Place all the ingredients then into a large pot, bring to the boil for 10 minutes wile stirring occasionally.
Allow the pot to them simmer while stirring occasionally for another 20 minutes until liquid starts to reduce.
When the liquid has reduced enough, remove from the heat and then blend using a hand blender. Allow the marmalade to cool to one side for up to 4 hours before storing in an air-tight container.
